modules.name: Mini Boss
modules.description: An emulation of the Yamaha YM2612 FM synthesis chip from the Sega Mega Drive and Sega Genesis.

modules.name: Name Corp Octal Wave Generator
modules.description: An emulation of the Namco 163 wavetable chip from Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) cartridges.

modules.name: Boss Fight
modules.description: An emulation of the Yamaha YM2612 FM synthesis chip from the Sega Mega Drive and Sega Genesis.

modules.name: Boss Fight Envelope Generator (Blank)
modules.description: A blank panel with an illustration of the envelope generator from Boss Fight.

modules.name: Infinite Stairs
modules.description: An emulation of the Ricoh 2A03 chip from the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES).

modules.name: Jairasullator
modules.description: An emulation of the General Instrument AY-3-8910 chip.

modules.name: Pulses
modules.description: An emulation of the Sunsoft FME-7 chip from Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) cartridges.

modules.name: Pallet Town Waves System
modules.description: An emulation of the Nintendo Gameboy Sound System chip.

modules.name: Pot Keys
modules.description: An emulation of the Atari POKEY chip.

modules.name: Super ADSR
modules.description: An emulation of the ADSR envelope generator from the S-SMP chip on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).

modules.name: Super Echo
modules.description: An emulation of the echo effect from the S-SMP chip on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).

modules.name: Super VCA
modules.description: An emulation of the Gaussian interpolation filter effect from the S-SMP chip on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).

modules.name: Sony S-SMP Blank
modules.description: A blank panel with an illustration of the Sony S-SMP chip on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).

modules.name: Super Sampler
modules.description: An emulation of the BRR sample playback engine from the S-SMP chip on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).

modules.name: Super Synth
modules.description: An emulation of the Sony S-SMP chip from the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).

modules.name: Mega Tone
modules.description: An emulation of the Texas Instruments SN76489 chip from the Sega Master System, Sega Mega Drive, and Sega Genesis.

modules.name: Step Saw
modules.description: An emulation of the Konami VRC6 chip from Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) cartridges.
